author: volibra
title: Identify patterns on Transaction
description: Detecting merchant, insider fraud in Crypto Payment system is difficult and identifying new types of risks in a timely manner is even harder
solution: ​​A Deep learning approach in Managing risk – through transaction pattern discovery to determine emerging risk in Crypto Payment behaviour
experience: A team of Machine Learning Phd student , Udacity Deep Learning Graduates , plutus Dev and Software Developers
